select wb.wechat_id wxId,wb.person_id personId,wb.phone,wb.house_id houseId ,hu.name houseName ,level.name levelName ,unit.name unitName ,build.name buildName ,r.name residentialName ,(select device_id from mj_device where mj_device.unit = unit.id) deviceId from mj_wechat_band wb ,mj_house_unit hu ,mj_build_unit level ,mj_build_unit unit,mj_build_unit build,mj_residential r where wb.house_id = hu.id and hu.unit_id = level.id and level.parent_id = unit.id and unit.parent_id = build.id and unit.residentail_id = r.id and wechat_id = #wxOpenId#

select wb.wechat_id wxId,mp.id personId,wb.phone,wb.house_id houseId ,hu.status houseOpenType ,hu.name houseName ,level.name levelName ,unit.name unitName ,build.name buildName ,r.name residentialName ,(select device_id from mj_device where mj_device.unit = unit.id) deviceId from mj_person mp,r_house_person rhp,mj_wechat_band wb ,mj_house_unit hu ,mj_build_unit level ,mj_build_unit unit,mj_build_unit build,mj_residential r where mp.id = rhp.person_id and mp.phone = wb.phone and rhp.house_id = hu.id and hu.unit_id = level.id and level.parent_id = unit.id and unit.parent_id = build.id and unit.residentail_id = r.id and mp.phone = #phone# and wb.company = #company# and r.create_user in (select mid from manager_user where manager_company = #company#)

sqlMap.select: select mwb.wechat_id wxId ,mwb.company from ( select * from mj_house_unit where name =#house# and unit_id in ( select id from mj_build_unit where parent_id in ( select mb.id from mj_device md ,mj_build_unit mb where md.unit=mb.id and md.device_id = #device#) )) temp , r_house_person rhp,mj_person mp,mj_wechat_band mwb where temp.id=rhp.house_id and mp.id = rhp.person_id and mwb.phone = mp.phone

select CONCAT(mr.name,' ',mbb.name,' ',mb.name) name from mj_device md,mj_build_unit mb,mj_residential mr,mj_build_unit mbb where md.unit=mb.id and mb.residentail_id = mr.id and mbb.id = mb.parent_id and device_id = #device#
